text:
### Signup
```
POST /api/login
```

This is where the user signs up.

Request
```
{
    username: "yogsther",
    password: "testpass123"
    name: "Test Testsson"
}
```

Response success: 
```
{
    success: true,
    me: {
    "id": 3,
    "username": "Yogsther",
    "name": "Olle Kaiser",
    "created": 1569100466208,
    "admin": 0,
    "email": null,
    "avatar": null,
    "slack_id": null,
    "slack_domain": null,
    "checked_in": false,
    "projects": []
    }
}
```
Response failure:
```
{
    "success": false,
    "text": "Missing parameters: username"
}
```
title: POST signup
